name: One Room With Ladders VR: Ludem Dare Jam 37
name_original: One Room With Ladders VR: Ludem Dare Jam 37
description:
Made for Ludem Dare 37 with the theme of "One Room." So I made a big dark room and put a bunch of ladders in it so you can hop and climb around.


If you can make it out the top with a torch in hand, you are a champion, great moves, proud of you!


Made for Vive and Rift.

Trigger = grab Menu Button = spawn torches if you want
